### Problem 4

```{r}
A <-  cbind(c(1,2,4),c(2,1,7),c(3,6,2),c(2,4,5))
B <- cbind(c(1,0,2,1), c(3,1,4,5), c(5,3,7,1), c(2,4,3,2))
# A <-  matrix(c(1,2,4,2,1,7,3,6,2,2,4,5), nrow=3, ncol=4)
# B <- matrix(c(1,0,2,1,3,1,4,5,5,3,7,1,2,4,3,2), nrow=4,ncol=4)

```

```{r}
A %*% solve(B)
```
